Был актёром вспомогательного состава Теа: Was an actor of the auxilary staff of the Film Actors' Theatre.
Учился в Московском финансовом институте: Studied at the Moscow Financial Institute. In 1958 he graduated from the directing department of VGIK.

В своём первом игровом фильме «Тамбу-Лам: In his first feature film «Tambu-Lambu» acted as a director and writer.
Стал лауреатом премии ВКф в номинации «х: became the winner of the VKF prize in the nomination «feature film for children and youth» for the film «City of Masters». The film was later included in the magazine «Art of Cinema» among the best children's films in a hundred years of cinema existence.

Родился в деревне Демешковка Березинског: born in the village of Demeshkovka, Berezinsky district, Minsk region of the BSSR. Childhood and school years were spent in the village of Chernevka, Borisov district.
После школы учился на курсах руководител: After school, he studied at the courses of amateur art leaders and at the ballet school. Army service held in Uruchye.
После демобилизации, работал на киностуд: Аfter demobilization, he worked at the Belarusfilm studio as an assistant to the artist, then as the head of the amateur film studio Zvezda of the Minsk ALC.
Поступил во ВГИК на отделение режиссуры: He entered VGIK on the department of directing feature films and television films.
Защитил диплом, дипломная работа — корот: Graduate diploma, thesis - the short feature film «Alekhine - a man «road».
Работал на студии «Летопись» киностудии: Worked at the studio «Letopis» film studio «Belarusfilm» and on television in the Belvideocentre.
Tried to start a career in fiction film. He put on a short feature film «Sergeant» about the war in Afghanistan, for which he received a prize at the Minsk festival of young filmmakers. The film was included in the movie almanac «The Bridge» and released on the All-Union screen.
Писал статьи с воспоминаниями для газеты: Wrote articles with memoirs for the newspaper «Sovetskaya Belorussia»
Умер. Похоронен рядом с родителями в дер: Died He was buried next to his parents in the village Chernevka.

Учился в школе № 42 в Минске. Окончил тр: He studied at school number 42 in Minsk. He graduated from the three courses of the Belarusian Theater and Art Institute in Minsk.
Работал разнорабочим на «Беларусьфильме»: He worked as a laborer at Belarusfilm, then as an assistant director, as an assistant to Vladimir Bychkov.
После нескольких попыток поступил на реж: After several attempts, he entered the directing department of VGIK (taking into account the previous education, he was accepted immediately to the second course
Режиссёр на студии «Беларусьфильм». Посл: director at the studio «Belarusfilm». After the first films made, the right to film The Last Summer of Childhood was almost accidental - after the untimely death on February 12, 1974, of director N. A. Kalinin. He was artistic director of «Belarusfilm».
Преподавал во ВГИКе, Институте современн: taught at VGIK, the Institute of Contemporary Art in Moscow, at the Higher Directing Courses, at the All-Russian Institute of Retraining and Advanced Training of Cinematographic Workers.
Возглавил мастерскую режиссуры кино и те: headed the studio directing film and television at the Institute of Contemporary Art, since 2004 - Dean of the Faculty of Cinema and TV directing there.

Работала на Белорусском телевидении и сн: worked on Belarusian television and made several films as author and director.
Поступила на дневное отделение в Белорус: entered the day department at the Belarusian State Theater and Art Institute (BGAI) at the faculty of directors of fiction film and graduated with honors (1994, master - Victor Turov).
Выиграв конкурс, прошла стажировку во Фр: having won the competition, had an internship at the French School of Cinematographic Sciences FEMIS, Paris.
Дебютировала полнометражным игровым филь: debuted the full-length feature film Fall Up. I made fiction and documentary films in the creative association BelVideo Center.

Опубликован сборник стихотворений и репр: published a collection of poems and reproductions -«Book» by Elena Trofimenko.
В юности был чемпионом Минска по у-шу(тр: In his youth, he was the champion of Minsk in wushu (the coach is the father). He graduated from the Lyceum of the Belarusian State University.
Закончил с отличием (с красным дипломом): Graduated with honors (with a red diploma) from the BSU, specialization - administrative law, political science. Graduate School of Journalism, BSU.
Прошёл режиссёрскую стажировку во МХАТе: He went through a director's internship at the Moscow Art Theater. Chekhov, where his teacher was the People's Artist of the USSR Oleg Tabakov.
Работал юристом в международной юридичес: worked as a lawyer in the international law firm «Vlasov and Partners», as well as assistant chairman of the Belarusian Union of Theater Workers (served as press secretary and head of a number of art projects of the Union).
Постоянный обозреватель авторитетного по: Regular columnist of the reputable political and economic weekly journal «Belorusskaya Gazeta» (wrote more than 150 articles); and the Chief Editor of National Television (ONT), oversaw several media projects of the channel.
Уже имел постановку в МХАТ им. Чехова, в: Had already been staged at the Moscow Art Theater Chekhov, at the age of 22, staged the play «Lost Paradise» on the stage of the National Academic Theater named after Yanka Kupala (premiered on November 9, 2002).
На сцене МХАТ им. Чехова состоялась прем: On the stage of the Moscow Art Theater Chekhov held the premiere of the play «The Piedmont Beast» based on the play by Kureichik.
Works as a screenwriter in the movies.
Работал в качестве редактора первого бел: Worked as editor of the first Belarusian television series' Hotel of wish fulfillment', CJSC Telefilm. On the basis of the Belarusian State Academy of Arts founded the Center for Contemporary Drama and Direction.
Принял участие в стажировке для менеджер: Took part in an internship for managers in the field of management of non-profit organizations in the United States, conducted by the US Department of State.
Был шеф-редактором газеты «Вестник культ: Was the editor-in-chief of the Vestnik Kultury newspaper.
Переехал из Минска в деревню под Смилови: He moved from Minsk to the village near Smilovichi, from where his parents bought a house there. In this house the script for the film «Love-carrot-2» was written.
Дом продал, и купил просторную квартиру: I sold the house, and bought a spacious apartment in Minsk, returning back to my capital with my family.
Вместе с Дмитрием Фригой, режиссёром Дми: Together with Dmitry Friga, director Dmitry Marinin, cameramen Alexei Korneyev, Artyom Yakimov and Nikita Pinigin founded the creative association Bez Buslou Arts.
Даёт мастер-классы в разных странах, пре: Gives master classes in different countries, taught scriptwriting at several universities in Russia, Belarus, and Lithuania.
